allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phases 1-3: app shell, pipeline, and Go/No-Go scorecard

Phase 1: Foundation — app shell, context, services, models, shared
components, RoleGate/FeatureGate guards, mock data service.

Phase 2: Lead Intake & Pipeline — SearchBar, DataTable, PipelineChart,
ExportButtons, StageIndicator components. Integrated into PipelinePage,
DashboardPage, LeadFormPage, and AppShell.

Phase 3: Go/No-Go Scorecard — 19-criteria dual-column scoring interface
with RBAC-gated columns, qualitative assessment fields, decision flow
\(GO/NO GO/WAIT\), project code validation, stage transitions, PDF/Excel
export, and read-only detail view.

Scorecard criteria use exact HBC Excel template values \(max 92 pts\).
Score thresholds: 69+ Focus All Efforts, 55-68 Pursue/Prioritize,
below 55 Drop.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/bobbyfetting/Project-Controls commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add site provisioning workflow enhancements \(Phase 29\)

Four enhancements to the provisioning and workflow systems:
- Project Setup Tracker widget on DashboardPage with real-time provisioning
  visibility, 7-dot step progress, summary KPIs, and retry for failed items
- Centralized pre-provisioning validation hook composing validators.ts with
  async duplicate-provisioning check, integrated into JobNumberRequestForm
- ProvisioningService.provisionSiteWithFallback\(\) three-tier fallback chain
  \(PowerAutomate → local 7-step engine → offline queue\)
- Feature flag gating on workflow steps \(featureFlagName/isSkippable on
  IWorkflowStep, skipped/skipReason on IResolvedWorkflowStep\) with
  resolveWorkflowChain\(\) skip/omit logic and UI updates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/bobbyfetting/Project-Controls commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge main into admin-feature-flag-update, resolve CLAUDE.md conflicts

flag work \(renumbered as Phase 28A/28B\). Pitfall numbers renumbered to
avoid collisions: main''s #36 kept, branch''s pitfalls shifted to #37-#38.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/bobbyfetting/Project-Controls commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''

Bash(git -C /Users/bobbyfetting/Project-Controls commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
ci: add GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline and Dependabot config

Three workflows: CI \(full build + .sppkg artifact on push/PR\), Release
\(tag-triggered GitHub Release with .sppkg\), PR Validation \(fast tsc + lint\).
Dependabot configured for weekly npm + actions updates with SPFx packages
pinned to patch-only bumps. Node 18.18.2 in CI \(within engines range\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
